description: This schema is used for verification of JSON objects used for creation of Automation Module Types.
title: Automation Module Type Definitions

___triggers.description: Container for Trigger Module Types used to create the Trigger Modules of the Rule.
___triggers.title: Trigger Module Types

items.description: Definition of the Trigger Module Type.
items.title: Trigger Module Type

___children.description: Contains definitions of the Trigger Modules of the Trigger Composition.
___children.title: Trigger Modules

items.description: Defines the fact which triggers the Rule execution.
items.title: Trigger Module

___description.description: A human understandable description of the Trigger Module.
___description.title: Trigger Module Description

___type.description: Identifies the Module Type used for creation of the Trigger Module. Must be unique in scope of concrete Trigger Composition.
___type.title: Trigger Module Type UID

___configuration.description: Used to define values for the configuration parameters of the Trigger Module.
___configuration.title: Trigger Configuration

___id.description: Identifies uniquely the Module in scope of the Composite Module Type.
___id.title: Trigger ID

___label.description: A human understandable label of the Trigger Module.
___label.title: Trigger Module Label

___visibility.description: Defines visibility of the Module Type.
___visibility.title: Visibility

___description.description: A brief description of what the Trigger is and for what it is used.
___description.title: Trigger Description

___outputs.description: Container for Trigger Outputs used to bring data to the other Modules of the Rule.
___outputs.title: Trigger Outputs

items.description: Output object of the Trigger used to transfer data to other Modules of the Rule.
items.title: Trigger Output

___description.description: A human understandable description of the output

___type.description: Fully qualified name of Java class or a human understandable text.

___tags.description: Shows how to be considered a given value. For example, as a Temperature.

items.description: A key word used for auto-mapping the output to available inputs. Shows how to be considered a given value.

___reference.description: Specifies what part of the given value will be used.

___label.description: A human understandable label of the output

___defaultValue.description: The value that will be used in case of missing dynamic output

___configDescriptions.description: Used to describe the configuration parameters of the Trigger.
___configDescriptions.title: Trigger Configuration Descriptor

items.description: Description of property for configuring the Module.
items.title: Configuration Parameter Description

___unitLabel.description: Specifies the unit label for the configuration parameter. This attribute can also be used to provide natural language units as iterations, runs, etc.
___unitLabel.title: Configuration Parameter Unit Label

___options.description: List of definitions of the parameter for static selection.
___options.title: Configuration Parameter Options

___type.description: Property declaring the data type of the configuration parameter.
___type.title: Configuration Parameter Type

___multipleLimit.description: Specifies the maximum number of options that can be selected when multiple is true.
___multipleLimit.title: Multiple Configuration Parameter Limit

___max.description: The maximal value for numeric types, or the maximal length of strings, or the maximal number of selected options.
___max.title: Configuration Parameter Maximum Allowed Value

___advanced.description: Specifies if this is an advanced parameter. An advanced parameter can be hidden in the UI to focus the user on important configuration.
___advanced.title: An Advanced Configuration Parameter

___required.description: Specifies whether the value is required.
___required.title: Required Configuration Parameter

___readOnly.description: Specifies whether the value is read-only.
___readOnly.title: Readable Configuration Parameter

___label.description: A human understandable label of the Configuration Parameter.
___label.title: Configuration Parameter Label

___groupName.description: A string used to group parameters together into logical blocks so that the UI can display them together.
___groupName.title: Configuration Parameter Group Name

___min.description: The minimal value for numeric types, or the minimal length of strings, or the minimal number of selected options.
___min.title: Configuration Parameter Minimum Allowed Value

___name.description: Identifies uniquely the configuration parameter in scope of the Trigger Type(must neither be null nor empty).
___name.title: Configuration Parameter Name

___multiple.description: Specifies whether multiple selections of options are allowed.
___multiple.title: Multiple Configuration Parameter

___description.description: A human understandable description of the Configuration Parameter.
___description.title: Configuration Parameter Description

___limitToOptions.description: Specifies that the users input is limited to the options list. When set to true without options, this should have no affect. When set to true with options, the user can only select the options from the list When set to false with options, the user can enter values other than those in the list.
___limitToOptions.title: limit To Options

___step.description: The value granularity for a numeric value
___step.title: Configuration Parameter Step

___filterCriteria.description: Criteria for dynamic selection of values.
___filterCriteria.title: Configuration Parameter Filter

___context.description: Serves to determine how to treat the value of the Configuration Parameter.
___context.title: Configuration Parameter Context

___unit.description: Specifies the unit of measurements for the configuration parameter.
___unit.title: Configuration Parameter Unit

___defaultValue.description: Declaring a default value for the Configuration Parameter if missing.
___defaultValue.title: Configuration Parameter Default Value

___pattern.description: The regular expression for a text type.
___pattern.title: Configuration Parameter Pattern
